sentences.en: Backlighting , is another lighting technique that can help improve the performance of your vision system.
sentences.cn: 反光, 是另一种光学技术,可以有助于你的视觉系统的性能.

sentences.en: Beware of backlighting problems on an upward tilt.
sentences.cn: 向上倾斜时要注意逆光问题.

sentences.en: In the condition of that when the light is insufficient (such as in the cloudy day or in the night), we can meet the backlighting problem.
sentences.cn: 在自然光线不足（阴雨、夜晚）的逆光情况下，要得到较为理想的车牌图像，需要进行人工补光。

sentences.en: Intelligent light - sensing technology automatically adjusts LCD screen and keyboard backlighting to react to ambient light levels.
sentences.cn: 智能 光传感 技术,自动调整键盘背光和液晶显示屏周围反应轻水平.

sentences.en: The fluorescent lamps backlighting have made progress in technology with the development of liquid crystal display.
sentences.cn: 随着液晶显示的发展,背光照明用荧光灯取得了技术进步.

sentences.en: The fluorescent lamps for backlighting have made progress in technology with the development of liquid crystal display.
sentences.cn: 随着液晶显示的发展，背光照明用荧光灯取得了技术进步。

trans.tran_cn: 背后照明( backlight的现在分词 )
